Title: Averardo Vault Important Notice (2)
Text:
The following is restricted to employees with Level 2 clearance or higher:

The Echo Depository, the second depository of the Averardo Vault, is a strictly controlled area. Unauthorized entry is considered a violation.

Its primary function is to contain, protect, and cultivate Echoes. It is the most dangerous section of the vault.

Strict adherence to protocols is mandatoryâ€”unauthorized actions will trigger the forced shutdown of the Echo containment systems.

Do not touch any containment devices, as certain Echoes require specialized containment measures.

Non-experts should avoid this area, as certain Echoes exhibit aggression.

The majority of Echoes are rare or possess unique traits and must not be damaged under any circumstances!
